user_query: I want to find top songs in different genres and get details including artist, duration, and genre.

TaskList.description: Query the list of top songs in the pop genre, including artist, duration, and genre.
Query the list of top songs in the rock genre, including artist, duration, and genre.
Query the list of top songs in the hip-hop genre, including artist, duration, and genre.
Query the list of top songs in the country genre, including artist, duration, and genre.
Compile and format the results from all genres into a single list of top songs with their details.
